H

handleCard(Player) - Method in class card.BaronCard
Player can choose the targetPlayer of his choice and privately compare the cards.
handleCard(Player) - Method in class card.Card
Abstract method which is different for every card subclasses.
handleCard(Player) - Method in class card.CountessCard
Notifies all players except the current player that the countess has been discarded.
handleCard(Player) - Method in class card.GuardCard
Player designates another player of his choice and names a type of card.
handleCard(Player) - Method in class card.HandmaidCard
Player cannot be affected by the other players card until the next turn.
handleCard(Player) - Method in class card.KingCard
The Current player exchanges card with another player.
handleCard(Player) - Method in class card.PriestCard
Player is allowed to see the hand of another player of his choice.
handleCard(Player) - Method in class card.PrinceCard
Player can choose any player including themselves to discard their card and draw a new card.
handleCard(Player) - Method in class card.PrincessCard
If a player discards this card, the player is out of the round.
HandmaidCard - Class in card
This card subclass contains the unique functionality of the Handmaid Card.
HandmaidCard() - Constructor for class card.HandmaidCard
Assigns the card its name and its value.
